title: LF Mid and Top (Gold)
body:
Making a team, currently looking for mid/top. 

Will run at least 1 tryout session, ~2-3 games a session with anyone who applies.

Mic and Discord required. No lower than Silver I no higher than Plat V. Add me for more details.

EDIT: Support tryouts also taken.

replies.body: i had added you on my smurf but you deleted me, ill be on cynanthr
